com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers
[Groovy] Class DSfile

java.lang.Object
  com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers.DSfile

class DSfile
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class to manage data source file stored as regular java property file

Authors:
- Janusz Kowalczyk

Constructor Summary
DSfile(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.Object log)

Default constructor : open a file and reads all the properties

get

java.util.List get(java.lang.String key, Splitter splitter)
brief:
Return properties key as a List. If List is empty then null is returned.
Parameters:
key - - a name of a key
splitter - - Splitter that separates key values
Returns:
A List of all key values
